collectible.title: TM 11 Sunny Day
collectible.subtitle: It has infinite uses. Ain't that great?
collectible.text: A peculiar disc that can teach certain Pokémon the move Sunny Day. Rosa gave it to you after the game, saying that it is a custom among Gym Leaders to give a present after they lose. Since you are not a Pokémon, you can't use it, but at least it's pretty.

collectible.title: Princess Rosa
collectible.subtitle: Inspired by Rosa's outfit in the movie ''Mystery Doors of the Magical Land.''
collectible.text: The joint power of hair buns and drills is extremely taxing on the soul. Only a few chosen can harness such a combination without instantly falling into madness. Luckily, Rosa can, which is pretty nice, cuz she looks cute imo.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Rosa and three other Pokémon characters.

collectible.title: Scientist Rosa
collectible.subtitle: Inspired by Rosa's scientist outfit from Pokéstar Studios.
collectible.text: The time machine malfunctioned again? Damn, that's the fifth time this month. At least, it seems that the only things that vanish are Rosa's clothes... so let's just call it a happy little incident.
collectible.unlock: Win a game against Rosa while starting with five layers or fewer.
